explains: vt. 尽情享受；使有风味；加调味品于；品尝，欣赏
vi. 有…的滋味；带有…的性质

sentences.en: Savor the silence, if that's what nature serves up, or thrill to the tap-tap of the woodpecker.
sentences.cn: 如果大自然给你的是寂静，那就尽情享受吧，或者随着啄木鸟的啄啄声而兴奋吧。

sentences.en: As the solarise chromatic over the horizon, I went out to savor the loveliness of the grassland landscape.
sentences.cn: 当太阳升过地平线时，我走出屋外来欣赏草原的美景。

sentences.en: Savor the joy of simple pleasures.
sentences.cn: 尽情享受简简单单的乐趣。
